message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $100 to you. Considering its value to you, I would like to propose a price of $95 for it. This is a great opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I see in the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective and I respect your valuation of the product. In light of this, I am willing to meet you halfway. My counteroffer is $85 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway last time, Bob. I'm willing to do the same this time. How about we meet in the middle at $82.50?

I appreciate your attempt to find a compromise, Bob. Let me propose $83.75 as my counteroffer. It's slightly above your last offer, but still reflects the value I place on the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $81.50, but I'm still hoping we can get even closer to my target price.

I understand your position, Bob. How about we agree on $82.25 for the product? This is a bit higher than your last offer but still within the range of what I consider fair value. I hope this proposal works for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $81, which is just $1 above my target price. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal here.
